caption: A woman is followed by a group of workers wearing white hats. The girl takes a gold animal ornament from her waist bag and tosses it in front of the group. The leading woman bites the ornament with her teeth and puts on sunglasses. The girl runs to a machine and embraces a huge beast. With the beast, she walks down a small road. At the other side of the fence, many similar beasts can be seen. As dawn breaks, the girl finds herself by a stream. There is a large beast and a small one. An old man sits in front of the house. The girl and the old man have a meal inside the house.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?(Does the technology exists on earth?)

Is there more than three different characters appear(not including people in the background)?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at day time and at night time.

breakpoint.answer: It' white and with a little yellow.
